110  void operator<<(SeqViewDouble& Data) {
111  Dmatrix* in = Data.GetData();
112 
113  if (in->size1() != 1) {
114  LogSevere("TransientDetection: multichannels not implemented resize");
115  throw bad_matrix_size("Wrong Matrix size");
116  }
117 
118  SetData(*in, Data.GetScale());
119  mStartTime = Data.GetStart();
120  mSampling = Data.GetSampling();
121  //mStartTime -= mSampling * static_cast<double> (WDF2Reconstruct::GetDataNeeded());
122  }
123 
124  void operator()(SeqViewDouble& Data, double sigma) {
125  Dmatrix* in = Data.GetData();
126 
127  if (in->size1() != 1) {
128  LogSevere("TransientDetection: multichannels not implemented resize");
129  throw bad_matrix_size("Wrong Matrix size");
130  }
131 
132  SetData(*in, Data.GetScale());
133  mStartTime = Data.GetStart();
134  mSampling = Data.GetSampling();
135  mWavThres.SetSigma(sigma);
136 
137  }

140 
141 
142 
143  int operator()(EventFullFeatured& Ev) {
144  double abov;
145  Dvector Cmax;
146  int level;
147  std::string Wave;
148  unsigned int res = GetDataVector(abov, Cmax, level, Wave);
149 
150  if (res == 1) {
151 
152  mEvFF.mlevel = static_cast<double> (level);
153 
154  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mNCoeff; i++) {
155  mEvFF.mCoeff[i] = Cmax[i];
156  }
157  mEvFF.mTime = mStartTime;
158  mEvFF.mSNR = abov;
159  mEvFF.mWave = Wave;
160  Ev = mEvFF;
161  }
162 
163  mStartTime += mSampling * static_cast<double> (mStep);
164  return res;
165  }
